biography_text: PORTER, Katie, a Representative from California; born in Fort Dodge, Webster County, Iowa, January 3, 1974; B.A., Yale University, New Haven, Conn., 1996; J.D., Harvard University, Cambridge, Mass., 2001; law professor; staff, office of the attorney general, California state department of justice, 2012-2014; faculty, University of California, Irvine, Calif., 2011-2018; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress (January 3, 2019-present).
